Title: Requires an annual report on individuals who are the primary caregiver for an older adult
Summary: Requires a report on individuals who are the primary caregiver for an older adult, including the number of individuals who are primary caregivers for an older adult, the average age of a primary caregiver, the cost to an individual to provide care to an older adult, and the economic value and savings to the state of such individual's services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to requiring an annual report on individuals who are the primary caregiver for an older adult
